title: WTB T206 Hall of Famers harder backs

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Hall of Famers harder backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for lower grade T206 HOFs, graded or raw.

Mostly collecting Cycle, AB, and Hindu but interested in any medium to very rare backs.

I would love to make a few deals before the year ends.

PM or email [url]jcosta19@gmail.com[/url]


Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
